short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows BTC fee rates using the mempool.space API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: browser extension for tracking BTC mempool fees. extension displays current recommended fee rates, pop up show all recommended fees, time since last block mined, and a chart that shows previous 24hours fees rates.
